sqls.sql: SELECT me_sn_part_id, si_item_no, si_item_name, si_item_value, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk01, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk02, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk03, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk04, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk05, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk06, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk07, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk08, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk09, qm_si_lot_b_tmp_rmk10, crt_time, crt_user, crt_host, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_user, upd_host FROM qm_si_lot_b_tmp WHERE qm_si_lot_b_tmp_id = @qm_si_lot_b_tmp_id;
